wikitext.*:
'''Scott Bennie''' is the author and game designer of ''[[The Lord of the Rings, Vol. I (1990 computer game)|The Lord of the Rings, Vol. I (PC)]]'',<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/lotr1.html The Lord of the Rings, Vol. I] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 1 January 2011)</ref> ''[[The Lord of the Rings, Vol. II: The Two Towers]]''<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/lotr2.html The Lord of the Rings, Vol. II: The Two Towers] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 6 February 2011)</ref> and ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings, Vol. I (SNES)|The Lord of the Rings, Vol. I (SNES)]]''. He also worked for [[Decipher]] on ''[[The Lord of the Rings Roleplaying Game]]''.
